product_name: Bison Designs Do It Yourself Paracord Bracelet Kit
long_description: Create your own distinctive survival bracelet with the Bison Designs Do It Yourself Paracord Bracelet kit. 14 ft. of tough nylon paracord comes with a low-profile, side-release buckle and step-by-step braiding instructions. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Create your own distinctive survival bracelet with the Bison Designs Do It Yourself Paracord Bracelet kit.
